userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Questions on literary property rights should be directed to the Special Collections Librarian.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Box [insert number], Folder [insert number and title], ODU Poster Collection, Special Collections and University Archives, Patricia W. and J. Douglas Perry Library, Old Dominion University Libraries, Norfolk, VA 23529.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The ODU Poster Collection contains a wide range of posters of musical performances, plays, athletic events, academic programs, student activities, lectures, discussions, seminars, readings, and festivals. They document recruitment foci, program offerings and the academic, political and cultural environment of the university.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains approximately 450 oversized color posters, dated from 1974 to 1990. Many of the posters are undated. The collection is arranged into the following series: I Administration and Services, II Academic Programs, III Departmental Events, IV ODU Organizations, V University Sponsored Community Events, VI Athletics.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Posters are arranged into alphabetically within each category.

scopecontent.p: Contains of posters advertising services or policies on Admissions, Career advising, Financial Aid, Honor Council, Housing, Public Safety, Womens Center and Miscellaneous.
